    Accéder à des référentiels

    G. Pressiat

    2018-06-14

    vignette1.Rmd

    Exemples d’accès à une table

    CCAM

    library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)


library(nomensland)

ccam <- get_table('ccam_actes')
dplyr::glimpse(ccam)
#> Observations: 8,356
#> Variables: 7
#> $ code               <chr> "AAFA001", "AAFA002", "AAFA003", "AAFA004",...
#> $ libelle_court      <chr> "exérèse T. intraparench cervelet craniot."...
#> $ type_acte          <chr> "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0"...
#> $ compatibilite_sexe <chr> "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0"...
#> $ date_debut         <chr> "2005-03-01", "2005-03-01", "2005-03-01", "...
#> $ libelle_long       <chr> "Exérèse de tumeur intraparenchymateuse du ...
#> $ date_fin           <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA,...

    CIM-10

    library(nomensland)

cim17_18 <- get_table('cim', 2017:2018)
dplyr::glimpse(cim17_18)
#> Observations: 81,038
#> Variables: 5
#> $ code      <chr> "A233", "A238", "A239", "A24", "A240", "B768", "B769...
#> $ tr        <chr> "0", "0", "0", "3", "0", "0", "0", "3", "0", "0", "0...
#> $ lib_court <chr> "BRUCELLOSE A BRUCELLA CANIS", "BRUCELLOSES, NCA", "...
#> $ lib_long  <chr> "Brucellose à Brucella canis", "Autres brucelloses",...
#> $ anseqta   <chr> "2017", "2017", "2017", "2017", "2017", "2017", "201...

    GHM

    library(nomensland)

ghm_rgp <- get_table('ghm_ghm_regroupement')
dplyr::glimpse(ghm_rgp)
#> Observations: 18,028
#> Variables: 13
#> $ ghm            <chr> "01C031", "01C032", "01C033", "01C034", "01C041...
#> $ libelle_ghm    <chr> "Craniotomies pour traumatisme, âge supérieur à...
#> $ da             <chr> "D05", "D05", "D05", "D05", "D05", "D05", "D05"...
#> $ libelle_da     <chr> "Système nerveux (hors cathétérismes vasculaire...
#> $ gp_cas         <chr> "C02", "C02", "C02", "C02", "C02", "C02", "C02"...
#> $ libelle_gp_cas <chr> "Chirurgie du rachis, Neuro-chirurgie", "Chirur...
#> $ ga             <chr> "G043", "G043", "G043", "G043", "G044", "G044",...
#> $ libelle_ga     <chr> "Chirurgies SNC trauma", "Chirurgies SNC trauma...
#> $ da_gp          <chr> "D05C02", "D05C02", "D05C02", "D05C02", "D05C02...
#> $ da_gp_ga       <chr> "D05C02G043", "D05C02G043", "D05C02G043", "D05C...
#> $ anseqta        <chr> "2012", "2012", "2012", "2012", "2012", "2012",...
#> $ aso            <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA,...
#> $ racine         <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA,...

    GHS

    library(nomensland)

ghs <- get_table('tarifs_mco_ghs')
dplyr::glimpse(ghs)
#> Observations: 23,440
#> Variables: 11
#> $ ghs         <chr> "0022", "0023", "0024", "0025", "0026", "0027", "0...
#> $ ghm         <chr> "01C031", "01C032", "01C033", "01C034", "01C041", ...
#> $ libelle_ghm <chr> "Craniotomies pour traumatisme, âge supérieur à 17...
#> $ borne_basse <int> 4, 7, 7, 12, 3, 7, 7, 12, 3, 5, 6, 14, 3, 4, 5, 7,...
#> $ borne_haute <int> 19, 38, 79, 124, 19, 39, 66, 105, 16, 30, 65, 84, ...
#> $ tarif_base  <dbl> 3753.62, 8426.88, 12805.25, 15954.70, 5755.54, 108...
#> $ forfait_exb <dbl> 0.00, 4673.26, 4378.37, 3149.44, 0.00, 5047.15, 37...
#> $ tarif_exb   <dbl> 324.05, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00, 865.97, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00...
#> $ tarif_exh   <dbl> 116.20, 87.53, 69.99, 241.16, 143.18, 110.10, 89.4...
#> $ date_effet  <chr> "01/03/2010", "01/03/2010", "01/03/2010", "01/03/2...
#> $ anseqta     <chr> "2010", "2010", "2010", "2010", "2010", "2010", "2...

    Dictionnaire des tables

    Un dictionnaire des tables et des variables est disponible.

    library(nomensland)
get_table('dictionnaire_tables') -> dico

DT::datatable(dplyr::distinct(dico, nom_table, commentaire_table, anseqta) %>% 
                select(nom_table, commentaire_table, anseqta) %>% 
                dplyr::arrange(nom_table), 
              escape = F, rownames = F, options = list(pageLength = 50))
